Adamanthral

Icon

Description

An experimental Adamantle and Mithral alloy.

Notes

Adamantle

Icon

Description

A purple crystal with some weak magical properties. It is also quite popular among royalty as jewelry due to its color.

Notes

Lined with Adamantle, this light-weight armor provides excellent protection.

  • Weight: 4 (3)

Admiral's Vengeance
Admiral's Vengeance

Icon

Description

Admiral Horus Mandrake received this sword as a gift from Guild Lord Demetrius Landgraab upon being promoted to Admiral. Rumor has it that the Admiral swore a blood oath upon it to slay every pirate on the high seas.

Properties

  • Attack: 6 (8)+1
  • Weight: 1

Notes

rewarded from The Betrayal

Adventurous

Icon

Description

Adventurous Sims are thrill-seekers and love to go out on expeditions. The more dangerous, the better!

Notes

  • Your sim can go on adventures in the forest and on the ship.

Advortonian Scale
Advortonian Scale - male

Icon

Description

Developed by a remote band in the Advortonian highlands, this armor is both light and extremely sturdy. It gave them such an advantage over their enemies that they quickly conquered much of Advorton under their banner.

Properties

  • Defense: 4 (5)
  • Weight: 2 (1)

Notes

Craftable by Blacksmith, Level 5

Recipe for Advortonian Scale

Product

 Advortonian Scale

Requirements

  • Blacksmith, Level 5

Ingredients

  •  Electrum: 4
  •  Ferrous: 5
  •  Phosphorus: 2

Notes

Air

Icon

Description

A mystical runestone imbued with the essence of wind, commonly used in spells of movement and illusion.

Ancient Bones

Icon

Description

Bones from some ancient creature.

Notes

Ancient Powder

Icon

Description

The disintegrated remains of some ancient artifact. Used in certain alchemical recipes and occasionally for forging. Most often found with buried treasure.

Notes

Angel's Talon
Angel's Talon and Angelsguard

Icon

Description

A sword of legend, rumored to have been given to Peter by The Watcher. This sword was eventually shattered into pieces by the battling of the two faiths over who should own the sword. The pieces were scattered across the continent and eventually lost to time.

Properties

  • Attack: 8+1
  • Weight: 3

Notes

  • Craftable by Blacksmith, Level 10, with manual

Recipe for Angel's Talon

Product

 Angel's Talon

Requirements

  • Blacksmith, Level 10
  • Read Manual of Blacksmithing: The Legendary Angel's Talon

Ingredients

  •  Mithral: 10
  •  Mystical Metal Fragment: 3

Notes

Angelsguard
Angel's Talon and Angelsguard

Icon

Description

Myth tells of an armor of white and gold, gifted by Jacob to man who would found the Jacob's Swords. For twenty years he went without losing a single battle while wearing it.Filled with Hubris, he single-handedly attempted to take on a horde of oppressed peasants. While he fought valiantly, they eventually tore him and his armor to pieces.These pieces were eventually scattered throughout the land, waiting for a master smith to reforge them.

Properties

  • Defense: 9
  • Weight: 1

Notes

Craftable by Blacksmith, Level 10

Recipe for Angelsguard

Product

 Angelsguard

Requirements

  • Blacksmith, Level 10

Ingredients

  •  Electrum: 3
  •  Mana Stone: 5
  •  Mithral: 8
  •  Mystical Metal Fragment: 4

Notes

Angelshammer
Blacksmith forging with the Angelshammer

Icon

Description

According to myth, The Watcher gave one of these divine hammers to Jacob and one to Peter, with instructions to forge a better life for their followers.Contrary to The watcher's desires, the hammers were instead used by the Jacobans and Peterans to forge weapons of war to fight each other. Enraged, The Watcher broke the hammers and scattered the pieces across the land.

Properties

  • Power: 10

Notes

Craftable by Blacksmith, Level 8

Recipe for Angelshammer

Product

 Angelshammer

Requirements

  • Blacksmith, Level 8

Ingredients

  •  Adamantle: 2
  •  Azurite: 2
  •  Mana Stone: 3
  •  Mithral: 5
  •  Mystical Metal Fragment: 1

Notes

Angelweed

Icon

Description

A rare, but happy little plant with feather-soft petals, its magic properties are used in many valuable potions. It is very delicate and only survives in out-of-the-way places around the kingdom.

Notes
